utils.environment.env_wrappers.FlatteningActionWrapperSquare

class utils.environment.env_wrappers.FlatteningActionWrapperSquare(env)

Bases: gym.core.ActionWrapper

A Gym environment action wrapper for the square environment.

Action wrapper which flattens a tuple of discrete actions into a single discrete action for the square environment.

factor_sizes

The list of the sizes of the discrete action spaces.

Type

list

action_space

The discrete action space.

Type

gym.spaces.Discrete

__init__(env)

Initializes the action wrapper.

Parameters

env (gym.Env) – The original Gym environment.

Raises

AssertionError – If the action space is not a tuple of discrete spaces.

Methods

Initializes the action wrapper.
